title: The flavonoid Sudachitin regulates glucose metabolism via PDE inhibition
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Ryoko Hatanaka, Akihiko Taguchi, Yuko Nagao, Kaito Yorimoto, Akari Takesato, Konosuke Masuda, Takao Ono, Yoshishige Samukawa, Yukio Tanizawa, Yasuharu Ohta
